title: HyperDash
description: HyperDash allows you to bring all of your data into a private, unified interface. Fully integrated with Apple's native widgets for iOS and macOS, it's almost infinitely customizable and compatible with nearly any REST API. HyperDash allows for unlimited connectivity like never before on your iPhone, iPad and Mac computer! The upcoming AI CoPilot will help you understand and interpret your data, as well as providing actionable insights.
